review: Fire TV Stick - A Not Ready For Prime Time PlayerThis is a great concept if it would only work! I am a big Amazon supporter and Customer, so not Amazon Bashing here, but this Fire TV Stick has serious problems and needs lots of refinement. I purchased two (2) of these thinking that the issues with GEN 1 Release were fixed NOT! Amazon should be ashamed of themselves for putting this prematurely into the marketplace.I cannot advise or recommend this product purchase to anyone. I have given this a 2 week review trial period and will probably return this product for a refund.My Network CAT and Wireless Network is sound and all connected devices work properly.  As others have reported this product has the following issues.1. Numerous Dropouts and disconnects. On-screen error messages are cryptic and often in conflict with other messages2. A Not so great User Interface that is simple, but yet clunky and without some needed features.3. The Remote is Cheap4. Amazon Support for this product - NONE! If you experience problems you basically are on your own. A Forum is not proper help/support for this type of product. Amazon has a nice On-Line "Mayday" help outlet for their HDX Fire Tablets (I have One) but none here that I have found.I have no way of telling if I received a defective product, or if this is the current standard and level of quality and performance for this latest revision of this product.
